document.full_text: alassane ouattara was inaugurated as president of ivory coast on saturday, in a ceremony most ivorians hope will end a decade of conflict and mend a once prosperous economy.
document.title: ouattara inaugurated as ivory coast president
lines_and_colors: alassane ouattara was inaugurated as president of ivory coast on saturday, in a ceremony most ivorians hope will end a decade of conflict and mend a once prosperous economy.
